name.baseName: Rare Earth reduction;Rare Earth;Molten Salt Electrolysis;NdFeB Magnet Scrap
稀土还原;稀土;熔盐电解;钕铁硼磁铁废料

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This process relates to the recovery and recycling of rare earth metals, specifically the Nd–Pr alloy, from NdFeB magnet scrap. The application is targeted for the reclamation of neodymium and praseodymium, which are critical in the manufacturing of new high-strength permanent magnets commonly used in various technologies, including electric motors, wind turbine generators, and hard disk drives.
此过程涉及从钕铁硼磁铁废料中回收和再循环稀土金属，特指Nd–Pr合金。其应用目的是为了从废旧磁体中回收稀土金属，尤其是钕和镨，这些金属是制造新型高强度永磁体的关键，永磁体广泛应用于各种技术中，包括电动机、风力涡轮发电机和硬盘驱动器。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit of this analysis was chosen as the production of one kg Nd–Pr alloy through extraction from NdFeB magnet scrap

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The one-step recycling process to extract rare earth metals from scrap magnets is being developed on a laboratory scale at TU Delft. Nonmagnetized, uncoated magnet samples were used in the experiment. The magnets were ball milled under inert atmosphere to increase the surface area to facilitate the electrochemical reactions, and the powder was inserted into the salt bath.
代尔夫特理工大学正在实验室规模上开发一种从废磁铁中提取稀土金属的一步回收工艺。实验中使用未磁化、未涂层的磁体样品。将磁体在惰性气氛下球磨以增加表面积以促进电化学反应，并将粉末插入盐浴中。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This process relates to the recovery and recycling of rare earth metals, specifically the Nd–Pr alloy, from NdFeB magnet scrap. The application is targeted for the reclamation of neodymium and praseodymium, which are critical in the manufacturing of new high-strength permanent magnets commonly used in various technologies, including electric motors, wind turbine generators, and hard disk drives.
此过程涉及从钕铁硼磁铁废料中回收和再循环稀土金属，特指Nd–Pr合金。其应用目的是为了从废旧磁体中回收稀土金属，尤其是钕和镨，这些金属是制造新型高强度永磁体的关键，永磁体广泛应用于各种技术中，包括电动机、风力涡轮发电机和硬盘驱动器。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The allocation of environmental flows to Nd and Pr was updated. Value allocation was used to share the process impacts from both multi-output stages, reflecting prices from recent years (2013–2016). There are two stages in the primary production of rare earths for which assumptions regarding coproductions are necessary: the beneficiation stage, where concentrated iron ore and rare earth concentrate are separated, and the solvent extraction stage undertaken to separate individual rare earths.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

Schulze, R., Abbasalizadeh, A., Bulach, W., Schebek, L. & Buchert, M. An Ex-ante LCA Study of Rare Earth Extraction from NdFeB Magnet Scrap Using Molten Salt Electrolysis. J. Sustain. Metall. 4, 493–505 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should take note that the life cycle assessment data is based on a one-step laboratory scale process for the extraction of rare earth metals developed by TU Delft, hence it may not directly reflect industrial scale operations. It is important to consider that this data should be used for initial assessments and theoretical evaluations, and careful attention should be given to scaling factors when applying this data to larger production scenarios. Users should also account for the allocation of environmental impacts between Nd and Pr based on the updated value allocation reflecting prices from recent years (2013–2016), particularly at the beneficiation stage and the solvent extraction stage.
使用此数据集的用户需注意，该生命周期评估数据基于代尔夫特理工大学开发的实验室规模上的一步回收工艺，因此可能并不直接反映工业规模的操作。重要的是要考虑这些数据应用于初步评估和理论评价，并且在将数据应用于更大规模生产场景时需仔细关注比例因子。用户还应根据近年来（2013-2016）价格反映的更新值分配，特别是在选矿阶段和溶剂萃取阶段，来考虑环境影响在Nd和Pr之间的分配。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
